name: v0.2.0 - Major Feature Update
body:
## Ironbullet v0.2.0 - Major Feature Update

### Highlights
- 9 new function/parser blocks for enhanced data manipulation
- Variable Input mode switcher on ALL text inputs (RAW/EMBED/VAR)
- Support for both <variable> and {{variable}} interpolation syntax
- Hits Database panel with filtering and management
- Professional help documentation with collapsible sections

### New Function Blocks
- ByteArray - Binary data manipulation (hex, base64, UTF-8)
- Constants - Define named constants for pipeline reuse
- Dictionary - Key-value operations (get, set, remove, exists)
- FloatFunction - Floating-point math operations
- IntegerFunction - Integer arithmetic operations
- TimeFunction - Timezone conversion and duration calculations
- GenerateGUID - UUID generation (v1, v4, v5)
- PhoneCountry - Extract country code from phone numbers
- LambdaParser - Parse text using lambda expressions

### Enhanced Input System
- Variable Input mode switcher on all text inputs
- Three modes: RAW (literal), EMBED (interpolation), VAR (dropdown)
- Color-coded badges: Amber (RAW), Blue (EMBED), Green (VAR)
- Auto-populated variable dropdown
- Available in HTTP, parsers, functions, controls, and all blocks

### UI Enhancements
- Hits Database panel in Data/Proxy tab
- Live results with auto-refresh, filter, copy, delete
- Remove duplicates functionality
- Removed redundant Runner tab
- Collapsible help sections in guides

### Bug Fixes
- Fixed sidecar binary name mismatch
- Fixed GenerateGUID V1 timestamp-based generation
- Fixed VariableInput component visibility
- All block parameters now passed to debug code view
- TimeFunction timezone conversion fixed
- PhoneCountry output formats implemented

### Download
Extract the archive and run ironbullet.exe. The sidecar binary (reqflow-sidecar.exe) must be in the same directory.

Full Changelog: See in-app changelog dialog for detailed changes.
